If the bundle does NOT meet TRC requirements but DOES meet Specs-based requirements, then it may be quoted for UC on UCS Specs-based only. If the bundle meets TRC requirements on this page, it may be quoted for UC on UCS TRC. Bundle SKUs for UC on UCS TRCs are listed in the UC on UCS section of Cisco Commerce Build and Price tool. Do not assume that other UCS bundle SKUs on Cisco Commerce Build and Price can be used with UC on UCS.
